      • getWeatherConditionAtSpecificTime

        public double getWeatherConditionAtSpecificTime(java.lang.String timeString,
                                                java.lang.String lonString,
                                                java.lang.String latString)
        returns the weather condition for a specified time and place. If no time is specified it defaults to the current time. if no place is specified it defaults to hamburg-mitte.
        Parameters:

        lonString - Longitude as String
        latString - Latitude as String
        Returns:
        weather Condition
